definition: to ill-use/to humiliate/to degrade/to ruin/also pr. [zuo2 jian4]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Rough winds do shake the darling buds of May.
sentences.chinese: 狂風把五月寵愛的嫩蕊作踐。

sentences.english: You do not owe me anything, no need to spoil myself.
sentences.chinese: 你沒欠我什麼，無需自己作踐自己。

sentences.english: Naturally, by adults see also being criticized, saying we selling food.
sentences.chinese: 自然，被大人瞅見了也是要遭罵的，說我們作踐糧食。
